title: Medical Language Communication Simulation: Co-Creation-Based Learner-Engaged Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and experience in patient counseling
context.additional_context: Patient communication competency enhancement program for medical device company managers, with VR simulations implemented via smartphone-compatible apps

learning_goals: Learners will co-create at least three conversation scenarios with patients in a VR simulation environment
Learners will collaborate with peers to identify and correct at least five medical language errors
Learners will improve conversation strategies by incorporating at least three peer feedback points after simulation evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
